content:
# The Stone Furnace now shows that it has successfully produced 17 Copper Plates, but it is currently reporting "NO FUEL" and "no ingredients to smelt." 
# The furnace has no Copper Ore left to process, which is why it cannot continue working.

# This indicates that the smelting process was completed successfully, but I need to ensure that I have enough Copper Ore for future crafting tasks. 
# I will now check my inventory to see what resources I have left and plan my next steps accordingly.

# Since I have 17 Copper Plates, I can now consider crafting items that require Copper Plates. 
# I will also need to gather more Copper Ore to continue producing more Copper Plates.

# Let's check my current inventory again to see what I have available.
current_inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Check the current inventory.
print(f"Current Inventory: {current_inventory}")  # Display the current inventory. 

# If I need more Copper Ore, I will move to the nearest Copper Ore patch to gather more resources.
if current_inventory[Prototype.CopperPlate] >= 17:
    print("I have enough Copper Plates for crafting.")
else:
    print("I need to gather more Copper Ore to produce additional Copper Plates.")
